quotes.quote: You must always be aware of your limitations and also of your best qualities.
quotes.author: Garry Kasparov

quotes.quote: Chess is life.
quotes.author: Bobby Fischer

quotes.quote: Unfortunately I'm still not a fashion expert.
quotes.author: Magnus Carlsen

quotes.quote: Chess is life in miniature. Chess is a struggle, chess battles.
quotes.author: Garry Kasparov

quotes.quote: I should give up chess and play checkers.
quotes.author: Andrew Chai

quotes.quote: Play the opening like a book, the middlegame like a magician and the endgame like a machine.
quotes.author: Rudolph Spielmann

quotes.quote: When you see a good move, look for a better one.
quotes.author: Emanuel Lasker

quotes.quote: There is no remorse like the remorse of chess.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.quote: Even a poor plan is better than no plan at all.
quotes.author: Mikhail Chigorin

quotes.quote: Tactics is knowing what to do when there is something to do; strategy is knowing what to do when there is nothing to do.
quotes.author: Savielly Tartakower

quotes.quote: Nobody ever won a chess game by resigning.
quotes.author: Savielly Tartakower

quotes.quote: Life is a kind of Chess, with struggle, competition, good and ill events.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Without error there can be no brilliancy.
quotes.author: Emanuel Lasker

quotes.quote: Some part of a mistake is always correct.
quotes.author: Savielly Tartakover

quotes.quote: To avoid losing a piece, many a person has lost the game.
quotes.author: Savielly Tartakover

quotes.quote: I prefer to lose a really good game than to win a bad one.
quotes.author: David Levy

quotes.quote: Every Pawn is a potential Queen
quotes.author: James Mason

quotes.quote: I am trapped inside your computer, please help.
quotes.author: Benjamin Tsoumagas

quotes.quote: A good player is always lucky
quotes.author: Jose Raul Capablanca

quotes.quote: Not to brag, but I put together a puzzle in 1 day and the box said 2-4 years.
quotes.author: Wahbi Raihan

quotes.quote: We like to think.
quotes.author: Gary Kasparov

quotes.quote: In life, as in chess, forethought wins.
quotes.author: Charles Buxton
